definition: to use for the purpose of/to serve as
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Small seashells have sometimes been used as a primitive kind of money.
sentences.chinese: 小贝壳有时用作简单的钱币。

sentences.english: The potential of oils as new types of larvicides for the control of mosquitoes are explored.
sentences.chinese: 这两种油品可开发用作防治蚊虫的新型杀幼虫药剂。

sentences.english: Knell beetles have also been known to be used as mounts by Underdark races.
sentences.chinese: 已经知道丧钟甲虫会被幽暗地域的种族用作坐骑。

sentences.english: How can digitization and technologies such as OAI be used as components of this resource?
sentences.chinese: 如何将OAI等的数码化和技术用作这新资源的元素？

sentences.english: A green variety of chrysoberyl used as a gemstone.
sentences.chinese: 一种绿色的金绿宝石，用作宝石。

sentences.english: Hammer and sickle symbols of the industrial worker and the peasant are used as the emblem of the ussr .
sentences.chinese: 代表产业工人和农民的锤子镰刀图案用作前苏联国徽。

sentences.english: Hormones have long been associated with some forms of cancer.
sentences.chinese: 激素类的药物一直被用作治疗某些癌症。

sentences.english: The data will be used for specific purposes only, and all indentifiable information would be discarded after the conference.
sentences.chinese: 这些资料只用作特定的用途，并于活动完结后销毁。

sentences.english: She used the cup for a soup bowl.
sentences.chinese: 她把那个杯子用作盛汤的碗。

sentences.english: As it is mainly for goods transportation the interior seems lousy.
sentences.chinese: 而基于它主要用作运送货物，内宠就显得凌乱。

sentences.english: The database could be used as a teaching resource in colleges.
sentences.chinese: 资料库可以用作大学里的一种教学辅导手段。

sentences.english: Jesus was born in a stable and a manger was used as his bed.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣诞生在马厩内，马秣槽被用作他的床。

sentences.english: No welding ground shall be made on the coated part of the article.
sentences.chinese: 管道涂塑的地方不允许用作焊接接地。

sentences.english: It is useful, for example, as an encapsulant for semiconductor products.
sentences.chinese: 例如，它用作半导体产品的密封剂。

sentences.english: Bone whistles, used as a type of flute, have been found dating back to 5,000 BC.
sentences.chinese: 用作笛子的骨哨早已出现在公元前5，000年。

sentences.english: Nickel-cadmium batteries are used to provide emergency back-up power on planes and trains.
sentences.chinese: 镍镉电池也用作飞机和火车的应急后备电源。

definition: to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to withdraw (money)/to collect (left luggage)/to extract/to refine
to deposit/to store/to leave in sb's care
to borrow sth for another use/to borrow an idea for one's own use
to replace/to take the place of
